      boolean addCustomGalleryTag(java.lang.String tag)
      Adds a tag to the user's custom gallery.
      boolean blockGalleryTag(java.lang.String tag)
      This adds a tag to the user's global gallery block list.

      Removes a tag from the user's custom gallery tag list.
      CustomGallery getCustomGallery(GalleryItem.Sort sort, GalleryItem.Window window, int page)
      Returns the currently authenticated user's custom gallery, which is based on tags that the user selects over time.
      CustomGallery getFilteredGallery(GalleryItem.Sort sort, GalleryItem.Window window, int page)
      Returns the currently authenticated user's filtered gallery, which is based on tags that the user selects over time.

      • getCustomGallery

        public CustomGallery getCustomGallery(GalleryItem.Sort sort,
                                      GalleryItem.Window window,
                                      int page)
                               throws BaringoApiException
        Returns the currently authenticated user's custom gallery, which is based on tags that the user selects over time. ACCESS: AUTHENTICATED USER
        Parameters:
        sort - - the sort direction
        window - - when the sort is Top, what the time range is
        page - - the page number, starting from 0
        Returns:
        a CustomGallery object with the results
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - - aw heck

      • getFilteredGallery

        public CustomGallery getFilteredGallery(GalleryItem.Sort sort,
                                        GalleryItem.Window window,
                                        int page)
                                 throws BaringoApiException
        Returns the currently authenticated user's filtered gallery, which is based on tags that the user selects over time. This is a gallery of things that the user explicitly does not want to see, at least based on the tags on the images. ACCESS: AUTHENTICATED USER
        Parameters:
        sort - - the sort direction
        window - - when the sort is Top, what the time range is
        page - - the page number, starting from 0
        Returns:
        a CustomGallery object with the results
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - - noooooo

      • addCustomGalleryTag

        public boolean addCustomGalleryTag(java.lang.String tag)
                            throws BaringoApiException
        Adds a tag to the user's custom gallery. Tags are "ored", not "anded". If a tag already existed, no action is taken. ACCESS: AUTHENTICATED USER
        Parameters:
        tag - - the tag string to add
        Returns:
        true if work was done
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - - something went sour

      • deleteCustomGalleryTag

        public boolean deleteCustomGalleryTag(java.lang.String tag)
                               throws BaringoApiException
        Removes a tag from the user's custom gallery tag list. No action is taken if it wasn't in there already. ACCESS: AUTHENTICATED USER
        Parameters:
        tag - - the tag string to remove
        Returns:
        true if action was taken
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - - something went wrong

      • blockGalleryTag

        public boolean blockGalleryTag(java.lang.String tag)
                        throws BaringoApiException
        This adds a tag to the user's global gallery block list. ACCESS: AUTHENTICATED USER
        Parameters:
        tag - - a tag string the user no longer wants to see
        Returns:
        true if action was taken
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - - something terrible happened

      • unblockGalleryTag

        public boolean unblockGalleryTag(java.lang.String tag)
                          throws BaringoApiException

        Parameters:
        tag - - the tag to remove
        Returns:

        Throws:
